heading: HB01666
0: AN ACT PRESCRIBING URGENT RELATED MEASURES NECESSARY AND PROPER TO EFFECTIVELY ADDRESS THE REPUBLIC THOROUGFARE CRISIS IN GREATER MANILA AREA AND OTHER URBAN CENTERS IN THE COUNTRY AND FOR OTHER PURPOSES
mother-bill statusstatus: Approved by the House on 2018-12-03, transmitted to the Senate on 2018-12-04 and received by the Senate on 2018-12-04 Substituted by HB06425
history:
House Bill/Resolution NO. HB01666
FULL TITLE : AN ACT PRESCRIBING URGENT RELATED MEASURES NECESSARY AND PROPER TO EFFECTIVELY ADDRESS THE REPUBLIC THOROUGFARE CRISIS IN GREATER MANILA AREA AND OTHER URBAN CENTERS IN THE COUNTRY AND FOR OTHER PURPOSES
SHORT TITLE : Public Thoroughfare Crisis Act Of 2016
ABSTRACT : Seeks to provide urgent measures necessary and proper to effectively address the public thoroughfare crisis in greater Manila area and other urban centers in the country.
PRINCIPAL AUTHOR/S : REVILLA, STRIKE B.
DATE FILED : 2016-07-18
SIGNIFICANCE: LOCAL
NATURE : Economic
ACTIONS TAKEN BY THE COMMITTEE
COMMITEE HEARINGS/ACTIONS:
      1. Scheduled for meeting/hearing on 2017-05-10
      2. Approved by the Committee on Appropriations on 2017-05-10
          -Substitute Bill to House Bill Nos. 3, 38, 554, 1315, 1666, 3048, 3162, 3314, 3442, 3617, 3712, 3716, 4334, 4699 and HR No. 119 was approved with amendments.
MOTHER BILL: HB06425
ACTIONS TAKEN BY THE COMMITTEE ON RULES
REFERRAL TO THE COMMITTEE ON TRANSPORTATION ON 2016-08-02
